name: n8tive
description: n8n Desktop Wrapper - Run n8n as a desktop application

scripts.package: npm run prepare:n8n && npm run build && cross-env ELECTRON_BUILDER_SKIP_DEPENDENCY_SCAN=1 electron-builder
scripts.rebuild:native: cd node_modules/sqlite3 && npm run install && cd ../better-sqlite3 && npm run build-release

author: n8tive
